cause.description: It has been stated in many places in our government that every U.S. citizen should have equal rights no matter race, religion, color, gender, but not for sexual orientation. Why? Do they think we're not good enough? I have seen unethical and unfair treatment in many events in U.S. history such as hate crimes, marriage laws, work laws, and many other daily situations. Today, it is said one in ten people are some form of LGTBQ. Thats a lot of people to oppress. Many gay people and there supporters are fed up with this unfair treatment. It is time to put an end to this oppression. Help us support this cause. Thank you to every one who is joining this cause. Maybe soon the government will get the picture that everyone should be free. Helpful websites if you'd like to learn more Human Rights Campaign Speak out. [Gay rights information.] Public Agenda 1. Homosexuals should have equal marriage rights. 2. Equal rights for homosexuals in the workplace. 3. Stop hate crimes against homosexuals. 4. Make schools a safer place to be for homosexual youth. 5. Teach kids and teenagers that being gay, having gay parents or friends is okay.
cause.mission: To create a safe enviroment for homosexuals and try to create equal rights for all.
cause.name: Homosexual rights
